name: Al Upton
message: Looks great Josh, I've joined up to jkn and will try it out later - could be very useful with my broadcast setup in Room 16 and the IWBs. Wonderful use of your blog and of course the always present serendipitous opportunity of finding out something kindred in others - you like Hercules Returns as well. I've only seen excerpts but not the whole film yet and yes that is a hugely funny quote.
